modName: Player Super Skin and more. - DELETED
summary: Basically, a small mod that changes a few things for the player.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will change some things to the player such as when you create a new one and even an already created player.

I took out most everything from the inventory except gold, torches, and lockpicks. Player clothing was also removed but you will still have the default prisoner outfit in your inventory. Gold = 1 million, torches 10 and lockpicks 100.
When making a new character you will be female nord instead of the default male nord. 
I have not tested this with the opening scene with the carriage ride because I have a mod that jumps me past that however, I'm assuming you will be nakey during that initial scene and thereafter. 

The biggest reason I did this was to create something sort of like advanced health but without GOD MODE. So as you can see in the video your health will regenerate faster as you will have Super Skin (Histskin) in your spell inventory. This will NOT be like the original spell that you can only use once per day. You will be able to use it anytime and the duration is set to two minutes. Remember that this is not god mode where you can never be killed. You can still die! So hope you like my lil mod and if so endorse it.

[youtube]xLQnxzh0ZFA[/youtube]
author: Sapphire
